mining_laser.name: Mining Laser
mining_laser.desc: Allows mining of ore from asteroids.

mini_smelter.name: Mini Smelter
mini_smelter.desc: Converts 6 ore into 2 metals per use.

mini_brewery.name: Mini Brewery
mini_brewery.desc: Converts 4 gas to 2 liquor per use.

station_kit_portable.name: Portable Station Kit
station_kit_portable.desc: Used for building your very own space station.

station_kit_mining.name: Mining Station Kit
station_kit_mining.desc: Used for building your very own space station.

station_kit_military.name: Military Station Kit
station_kit_military.desc: Used for building your very own space station.

station_kit_industrial.name: Industrial Station Kit
station_kit_industrial.desc: Used for building your very own space station.

station_expander.name: Station Expander
station_expander.desc: A section for increasing station capacity by 100.

choco_latte.name: Choco-Latte
choco_latte.desc: Used to be popular in ancient times. Discussion is still ongoing on whether it was a food or a drink. Regardless, many packages of this ancient curiosity are still around, perfectly fit for consumption.
